alert.note: Alert for Lucas; Wood (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 26 at 3:42PM EDT until July 26 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Wood County in northwestern Ohio... Lucas County in northwestern Ohio... * Until 430 PM EDT. * At 342 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Oregon to near Woodville to near North Baltimore, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Toledo, Bowling Green, Fostoria, Perrysburg, Oregon, Sylvania, Rossford, Waterville, Northwood, North Baltimore, Holland, Maumee, Ottawa Hills, Walbridge, Pemberville, Millbury, Haskins, Luckey, Bradner and Wayne. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
